
Download
========

The recommended method to get psubprocess is to download one of the releases, but if you want to access the latest code you can do it at `git <http://github.com/JoseBlanca/psubprocess>`_.

psubprocess 0.1
---------------

:download:`psubprocess 0.1.0 <downloads/psubprocess-0.1.0.tar.gz>`. Relased on 30-04-2010.

Changes:

 * Initial Release.

Feedback, positive or negative will be appreciated.
